item.title: 纳斯达克期货收平，英伟达因中国市场不确定性下滑
item.description: 由于中美贸易战的不确定性迫使这家人工智能芯片巨头在其季度预测中剔除了潜在的中国销售额，英伟达（Nvidia）股价下跌。【原文：Futures tracking the tech-heavy Nasdaq were flat on Thursday, constrained by a drop in Nvidia shares, as uncertainty around the Sino-U.S. trade war forced the AI chip giant to leave out potential China sales from its quarterly forecast.】

item.title: 技术故障影响预期，CrowdStrike 下跌
item.description: 周四收盘前，CrowdStrike 的股价下跌了约 3%，原因是这家网络安全公司的季度收入预期疲软，表明去年一次失败的更新导致全球网络中断的影响仍在持续。【原文：CrowdStrike shares fell about 3% before the bell on Thursday after the cybersecurity firm's weak quarterly revenue forecast signaled the lasting effects of a botched update last year that caused a global outage.】

item.title: 宝马首席执行官表示，在推出全电动汽车之前 "不能犯错"。
item.description: 宝马公司首席执行官奥利弗-齐普斯（Oliver Zipse）预计未来几年汽车行业将重新排序，并在周四接受采访时警告说，该行业经不起失误，因为该公司将重金押在其改良后的电动汽车产品上。【原文：BMW chief executive Oliver Zipse expects a reordering of the car industry in the coming years, warning in an interview on Thursday that the sector cannot afford mistakes, as the company bets heavily on its revamped electric vehicle offering.】

item.title: 中远称在美国贸易压力下面临国际投资 "挑战
item.description: 中远船务港口公司总经理周四在香港举行的财报会议上表示，在美国贸易战的压力下，该公司的国际投资正面临 "挑战"。【原文：Cosco Shipping Ports said it is facing "challenges" with its international investments amid pressures from the U.S. trade war, its managing director said in an earnings conference in Hong Kong on Thursday.】

item.title: 特斯拉和 Waymo 截然不同的机器人出租车方法将如何影响行业发展
item.description: 特斯拉于今年 6 月在德克萨斯州奥斯汀为部分粉丝推出了机器人出租车试运行服务，一个月后，特斯拉首席执行官埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）告诉投资者，该公司的无人驾驶出租车将有可能在今年年底前为 "美国一半人口 "提供服务。【原文：A month after Tesla launched a trial robotaxi service in Austin, Texas, in June for select fans, CEO Elon Musk told investors that the company’s driverless taxis would likely be available to “half the population of the U.S.” by the end of this year.】

item.title: 人工智能热潮推动数据平台需求增长，雪花公司股价大涨
item.description: 随着企业竞相对数据基础设施进行现代化改造并简化人工智能的采用，Snowflake 的股价周四大涨约 14%，这是对其人工智能数据库产品需求的推动。【原文：Snowflake shares jumped about 14% on Thursday riding a wave of demand for its artificial intelligence database products, as companies race to modernize their data infrastructure and simplify AI adoption.】

item.title: 澳大利亚澳新银行在过早发出裁员邮件后提供心理辅导
item.description: 澳大利亚澳新银行集团（ANZ Group）向员工道歉并提供心理咨询，因为一些被指定裁员的银行家被误发的自动邮件通知将被解雇。【原文：Australia's ANZ Group apologised to staff and offered psychological counselling after some bankers earmarked for job cuts were notified they would be fired in an automated email that was sent by mistake.】

item.title: 法国干邑销量下降 13%，原因是高端产品需求下滑
item.description: 根据路透社获得的行业数据，受法国白兰地高端系列需求下降和对华销售下滑的影响，干邑的年收入下降了 13%。【原文：Annual cognac revenues dropped 13%, hit by a drop in demand for premium ranges of the French brandy and a slump in sales to China, according to industry data shared with Reuters.】

item.title: 滴滴第二季度亏损 3.5 亿美元，原因是计提了诉讼准备金，尽管收入有所增长
item.description: 中国打车服务巨头滴滴出行周四公布，受一次性费用影响，第二季度净亏损25亿元人民币（约合3.5亿美元），尽管收入增长了10.9%，部分原因是海外业务的增长。【原文：Chinese ride-hailing giant Didi Global reported on Thursday a second-quarter net loss of 2.5 billion yuan ($350 million), driven by a one-off charge, even as revenue rose 10.9%, partly fuelled by growth in overseas business.】

item.title: 墨西哥官员表示，墨西哥将允许更多巴西肉类加工厂发货
item.description: 巴西农业部贸易秘书路易斯-鲁阿（Luis Rua）告诉路透社，墨西哥当局将在下个月启动对 14 家巴西肉类包装厂的审计，以批准它们向墨西哥出口。【原文：Mexican authorities will kick off audits of 14 Brazilian meatpacking plants next month to clear them to send exports to Mexico, Luis Rua, secretary of trade at Brazil's agriculture ministry, told Reuters.】

item.title: 波音寻求欧盟批准 Spirit 交易
item.description: 欧盟委员会网站上的文件显示，波音公司正在寻求欧盟批准回购全球最大的独立航空结构公司 Spirit AeroSystems。【原文：Boeing is seeking EU approval to buy back Spirit AeroSystems , the world's largest standalone aerostructures company, documents on the European Commission website show.】

item.title: 中国扩大对从美国、欧盟、韩国、日本和泰国进口苯酚的反倾销税征收范围
item.description: 中国商务部周四发表声明称，中国已将对从美国、欧盟、韩国、日本和泰国进口的苯酚征收反倾销税的期限延长五年，自8月29日起生效。【原文：China has extended anti-dumping duties on phenol imported from the United States, the European Union, South Korea, Japan, and Thailand for five years, effective August 29, China's commerce ministry said in a statement on Thursday.】

item.title: 欧洲央行行长雷恩：特朗普对美联储独立性施压带来全球风险
item.description: 欧洲央行决策者奥利-雷恩（Olli Rehn）在周四的一次演讲中表示，唐纳德-特朗普总统对美国联邦储备局的攻击不断升级，可能会对金融市场和实体经济产生实质性的全球性连锁反应。【原文：President Donald Trump's escalating attacks on the U.S. Federal Reserve could have substantial and global knock-on effects on the financial markets and the real economy, ECB policymaker Olli Rehn said in a speech on Thursday.】

item.title: 印度首次面临针对网络货币游戏禁令的法律挑战
item.description: 一份法律文件显示，印度游戏公司 A23 已对政府禁止基于金钱的在线游戏的禁令提出质疑，这是该公司针对该法律提起的第一起诉讼。【原文：Indian gaming company A23 has challenged the government's ban on online money-based games, a legal filing shows, in the first case against a law that led to the sudden shutdown of popular contests and has thrown the industry's future into doubt.】

item.title: 英国软猫公司 6 个月内第 3 次上调年度利润展望
item.description: 英国软猫公司（Softcat）周四在六个月内第三次上调了年度利润增长预期，原因是第四季度执行了更大的合同。【原文：British firm Softcat lifted its annual profit growth forecast for the third time in six months on Thursday, driven by execution of larger contracts in the fourth quarter.】

item.title: 解说员：农产品在中美贸易协议中扮演什么角色？
item.description: 全球谷物贸易商都在密切关注中美之间的谈判，以寻找在农产品关税问题上取得进展的迹象，这是对美国农民在其第一大出口市场重新站稳脚跟的一个关键考验。【原文：Grains traders globally are closely watching talks between the United States and China for signs of progress on agricultural tariffs, a key test for American farmers to regain a foothold in their top export market.】

item.title: 特朗普儿子支持的美国比特币将于 9 月开始交易
item.description: 由美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的两个儿子支持的比特币矿商美国比特币公司（American Bitcoin）最大的投资者表示，该公司已经锁定了加密货币和传统投资者，支持全股票合并，这将使该公司很快开始在纳斯达克交易。【原文：American Bitcoin, the bitcoin miner backed by U.S. President Donald Trump's two sons, has locked in crypto and traditional investors to back an all-stock merger that will allow the firm to soon start trading on the Nasdaq, the company's largest investor said.】

item.title: 东京电子称未确认台积电机密窃取案起诉后有任何组织涉案
item.description: 日本芯片制造设备制造商东京电子公司周四表示，在台湾一名前雇员因涉嫌窃取台积电商业机密而被起诉后，东京电子公司尚未证实有任何组织参与其中。【原文：Tokyo Electron has not confirmed any organisational involvement following the indictment of a former employee in Taiwan for alleged theft of trade secrets from TSMC, the Japanese chipmaking equipment maker said on Thursday.】

item.title: 英伟达发布财报后股价在法兰克福下跌 2.9
item.description: 英伟达（Nvidia）在法兰克福上市的股票周四下跌了 2.9%，此前一天，该公司在其重要的数据中心领域的业绩低于一些分析师的预期。【原文：Nvidia's Frankfurt-listed shares fell 2.9% on Thursday, a day after its results came up short of some analyst expectations in its important data centre segment.】

item.title: 保乐力加预计第一季度销售额下降，中国和美国的困境仍在继续
item.description: 保乐力加报告称，2025 年全年有机销售额下降了 3%，符合预期，但警告称，由于关税的不确定性以及美国和中国销售额的下滑，第一季度收入将有所下降。【原文：Pernod Ricard reported a 3% fall in full-year 2025 organic sales which met forecasts, but warned of lower first quarter revenues amid tariff uncertainty and sliding sales in the United States and China.】

item.title: 保乐力加年销售额受美国和中国困境影响
item.description: 保乐力加（Pernod Ricard）周四发布报告称，在关税不确定以及美国和中国销售下滑的情况下，2025 年全年有机销售额下降了 3%，与预测一致。【原文：Pernod Ricard reported a 3% fall in full-year 2025 organic sales on Thursday, in line with forecasts, amid tariff uncertainty and sliding sales in the United States and China.】

item.title: 北美和中国电动汽车需求强劲，丰田 7 月销量连续第七个月增长
item.description: 日本汽车制造商丰田汽车周四表示，由于北美市场需求强劲以及混合动力和新型电动车型在中国的强劲表现，丰田汽车7月份的全球销量连续第七个月增长。【原文：Toyota Motor's global sales rose in July for a seventh consecutive month, anchored by robust demand in North America and strong performance of hybrid and new electric models in China, the Japanese automaker said on Thursday.】

item.title: 韩国央行预计美国贸易协议达成后仍将对经济造成 "重大 "冲击
item.description: 韩国央行周四表示，预计即使在达成贸易协议后，美国提高关税也会对经济造成 "重大 "冲击，理由是与竞争对手的出口国相比，韩国的关税上调幅度要大得多，而且对特定产品征收关税的风险也很高。【原文：South Korea's central bank expects a "significant" economic shock from higher U.S. tariffs even after a trade deal, it said on Thursday, citing comparably steeper tariff hikes versus rival exporters and high exposure to product-specific duties.】

item.title: 早间竞购英伟达(Nvidia)业绩乏善可陈，利润仅为可观而非传奇
item.description: 格雷戈尔-斯图尔特-亨特对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Gregor Stuart Hunter】

item.title: UAW 工会称在肯塔基州福特合资电池厂的投票中获胜
item.description: 美国汽车工人联合会（UAW）周三表示，它在肯塔基州一家福特合资工厂的工会组织投票中获胜，但认为仍有 41 张质疑票不合法。【原文：The United Auto Workers (UAW) said on Wednesday it won a vote to at a Ford joint-venture plant in Kentucky to unionize it, but believed 41 challenge ballots still pending to be illegitimate.】

item.title: 韩国机构就重大数据泄露事件对 SK 电讯罚款 9700 万美元
item.description: 韩国最大的移动运营商 SK 电讯公司今年遭遇网络攻击，导致近 2700 万用户数据泄露，该公司周四被罚款约 1,340 亿韩元（合 9,653 万美元）。【原文：South Korea's SK Telecom was fined on Thursday about 134 billion won ($96.53 million) after the country's largest mobile carrier suffered a cyberattack this year causing the leak of data for nearly 27 million users.】

item.title: 科技股涨势降温，外国人抢购日本股票
item.description: 截至 8 月 20 日的一周内，外国投资者成为日本股市的净卖家，这是九周以来的首次，因为他们在科技股下挫导致市场反弹受阻后转为谨慎，转而锁定利润。【原文：Foreign investors were net sellers of Japanese stocks in the week to August 20, for the first time in nine weeks, as they turned cautious, moving to lock in profits after a selloff in technology stocks stalled a market rally.】

item.title: 两名微软员工因占领总统办公室抗议与以色列的关系而被解雇
item.description: 周三，两名微软员工在公司总裁办公室静坐示威，抗议该公司在加沙发动战争时与以色列的关系，随后被解雇。【原文：Two Microsoft employees were fired on Wednesday after taking part in a sit-in at the office of the company's president to protest the firm's ties to Israel as it wages war in Gaza.】

item.title: 欧洲 7 月汽车销量恢复增长，比亚迪稳超特斯拉
item.description: 欧洲汽车制造商协会周四公布的数据显示，7月份欧洲新车销量增长了5.9%，德国的增长超过了英国、法国和意大利的下降。【原文：New car sales in Europe rose 5.9% in July as a jump in Germany outweighed drops in Britain, France and Italy, European Automobile Manufacturers Association data showed on Thursday.】

item.title: 通用电气埃文代尔工厂的 UAW 成员将从周四起举行罢工
item.description: 美国汽车工人联合会主席肖恩-费恩（Shawn Fain）在周三晚些时候播放的一段视频中表示，通用电气航空航天公司俄亥俄州埃文代尔（Evendale）工厂的美国汽车工人联合会成员在未能达成新合同后，将从周四起举行罢工。【原文：Members of the United Auto Workers union at GE Aerospace's Evendale, Ohio, plant will strike from Thursday after failing to reach a new contract, UAW President Shawn Fain said in a video broadcast late on Wednesday.】
